questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'I've _______ (finish) my homework.'
Spot the mistake: 'He's just come to the party.'
Fill in the blank: 'Have you done your chores _______?'
Spot the mistake: 'She's yet finished the report.'
Fill in the blank: 'They've _______ seen that movie twice.'
Spot the mistake: 'I've yet to eat breakfast.'
Fill in the blank: 'She's _______ been to Paris.'
Spot the mistake: 'They've just not arrived at the station.'
Fill in the blank: 'We haven't received the mail _______.'
Spot the mistake: 'He's already don't buy the tickets.'
